title: I like it but

author: nick farris
comment: Works well so far. I had a slip up with a different watch from them, but this proved to be well worth the money. Having all that info on your wrist is pretty useful.
title: Every thing you need

author: Zachary Bohlman
comment: Looks great and provides a lot of cool info but the battery drain is the worst I've ever seen and makes it unusable, about 45% gone in 3 hours.
title: Battery drain

author: Michael Schramm
comment: Top notch style and features. Does drain the battery a bit faster that other faces, but for all it does and how great it looks, it's worth it!

author: Eternal Tsang
comment: The percentage of battery indicator of mobile is not same as watch.  And does it have the setting about the 2nd time zone (zulu time)? thanks

author: Nick Hall
comment: I love this watch face. I'm not sure it can get any cooler than this.
title: Awesome

author: Daniel Turner
comment: Looks really nice. Not tested battery life though yet
title: Watchface

author: Napoleon Velasco Carrillo
comment: The watch didn't change the time when I moved from Denver, Colorado to Guymon, Oklahoma. It had to add an hour since I change the time zone. It did in my cellphone, but I had to reload the watchface in order to get the right time.
title: Great design, but I found a bug.

author: David Tri Putra
comment: It's so complete content on my moto 360. So futuristic
title: Love this watchface

author: Poloasis
comment: Great watch face but weather display is broken. Moto 360 1st gen does not display weather info. Updated... Fixed weather. Wooohooo

author: David kondrat
comment: Love the watch face. Lots of great info. Watch can be used for planning
title: Great watch face.

author: Jesus Arellanes
comment: Awesome
title: Cool

author: Geofferey Eakins
comment: This is an awesome watch face with tons of information. It does drain battery somewhat but you can change some settings to help negate the effect.
title: Great Face

author: R.K.
comment: A generally good looking watch face with a lot of information in a way that is for the most part relatively easy to read. There are other watch faces that look nicer but I like this one because of the balance of data it provides.
title: Good overall watch face

author: Mark Hampson
comment: Waste of money drains battery on moto360 from 80% to 19% in 2 hours.

author: Chris Bassett
comment: Purchased this and another face from the same company. It does not show in my android wear app. I emailed the support with no response yet. I had to turn off the heart rate monitor because of battery drain but that is minimal..thanks for the quick response as well.
